name: @takanarishimbo/mermaid-live-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server for generating Mermaid diagrams using Mermaid Live and Mermaid Ink
long_description: This Model Context Protocol (MCP) server provides powerful diagram creation tools using Mermaid Live and Mermaid Ink services. With this MCP, AI assistants can create flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, and other Mermaid visualizations.

mermaid_ink_base_url.title: Mermaid Ink Base URL
mermaid_ink_base_url.description: Mermaid Ink rendering service base URL

default_output_dir.title: Default Output Directory
default_output_dir.description: Default directory for saving files (absolute path, default: Desktop in home directory)

tools.name: create-mermaid-diagram
tools.description: Create a Mermaid diagram - get URLs for editing/viewing/downloading or save diagram to file

prompts.name: create_flowchart_url
prompts.description: Create a flowchart and get URLs
prompts.text: Create a flowchart showing our development process. Include decision points and clear flow directions. Use action: get_url to provide URLs for editing and viewing.

prompts.name: create_flowchart_file
prompts.description: Create a flowchart and save to file
prompts.text: Create a flowchart showing our development process. Include decision points and clear flow directions. Use action: save_file to save it as PNG file to my desktop.

prompts.name: create_sequence_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a sequence diagram and get URLs
prompts.text: Create a sequence diagram for our API authentication flow. Show all the interactions between client, server, and database. Use action: get_url for team review and sharing.

prompts.name: create_sequence_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a sequence diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Create a sequence diagram for our API authentication flow. Show all the interactions between client, server, and database. Use action: save_file to save it as SVG file for technical documentation.

prompts.name: create_class_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a class diagram and get URLs
prompts.text: Generate a class diagram for our user management system. Include relationships, methods, and properties. Use action: get_url for collaborative editing and review.

prompts.name: create_class_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a class diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Generate a class diagram for our user management system. Include relationships, methods, and properties. Use action: save_file to save it as PDF file for architecture documentation.

prompts.name: create_state_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a state diagram and get URLs
prompts.text: Create a state diagram for our order processing workflow. Show all states and transitions clearly. Use action: get_url for stakeholder review and presentation.

prompts.name: create_state_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a state diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Create a state diagram for our order processing workflow. Show all states and transitions clearly. Use action: save_file to save it as PNG file for process documentation.

prompts.name: create_gantt_chart_url
prompts.description: Create a Gantt chart and get URLs
prompts.text: Create a Gantt chart for our project timeline. Include milestones and task dependencies. Use action: get_url for project planning collaboration.

prompts.name: create_gantt_chart_file
prompts.description: Create a Gantt chart and save to file
prompts.text: Create a Gantt chart for our project timeline. Include milestones and task dependencies. Use action: save_file to save it as PDF file for project management.
